summary:
Tom Vereijken joined the Board of Dutch Water Authority 'Zuiderzeeland' in 2019 and was re-elected in 2023. He is a Full Member of the Club of Rome – EU Chapter, co-edited Elsevier’s ‘Treatise on Water Science’ (ISBN-13: 9780444531933) and contributed to several other recent books and European research projects. Tom received executive MBA-degrees from Nyenrode Business Universiteit (NL) and the University of Rochester (NY), and was decorated by the University of Valencia.

Tom worked over 20 years for the Dutch water technology company Paques B.V. on design and performance of industrial wastewater treatment facilities. He was co-founder of the European Water Partnership and co-initiated a European system to measure and verify progress in sustainable water management, the European Water Stewardship. As director of the Water Stewardship Academy he developed concrete steps to combat diffuse pollution of water with focus on medical and agriculture/food sectors. In 2020 he co-initiated the Dutch Consortium Antibiotics and Pharmaceutical Residues from Water.
